typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserID as string,
		{Signup Date} as string,
		{User Segment} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceUserdata
sourceUserdata derive(UserID = trim(upper(UserID)),
		{User Segment} = trim(upper({User Segment})),
		{Signup Date} = toTimestamp ({Signup Date},'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
